Lego NXT Robots

For Chrome use Right Hand Mouse Button and select "save link as".
using Chrome Save As

You may get a Restriction message similar to this, if so simply press OK and carry on possible restriction save you may get


Then find the folder you wish to download to and then press "Save"
using Chrome File Save

Lesson 4 Touch Sensor


Introduction to the Touch Sensor. We shall see how we can use it for collision detection.
The extension shows how we can give a Robot a RANDOM choice of its reaction to the collision
